content: Facundo Mémoli Facundo Mémoli facundo.memoli@gmail.com Links Talks Students Research Teaching Home I am a professor in the Department of Mathematics at Rutgers University. My research interests include topics in the intersection of metric geometry, topology, probability, and applications to science and engineering. Prospective students: Please read this. The Network Data Analysis group. I'm grateful to the NSF for their support. I am currently PI on these grants: NSF-AF-2523653, NSF-IIS-2524678, and NSF-DMS-2524362. My email facundo.memoli@gmail.com.
